list.name: Changes
list.comment: Added Previous button for Pagination on movie_list.html, and fixed the movie_detail.html text under No Reviews Yet making it visible.

component.name: DjangoConsoleOptions

option.name: myCustomStartScript

task.summary: Changed time language settings and allowedhosts , created empty database and created startapp movie
Created model Movie , made migration movie and database tables , created superuser and model Movie available at Django
Created movie/urls.py , created movie/templates/movie/post_list.html and made basic Django QuerySets,Filters,Order_by on Django Shell/Python Console

Added new model on models.py named Category, updated it on admin.py , changed movie_detail.html and movie_list.html(the detailed movie view and general movie list view) , filtered Movies based on category on views.py , installed Pillow library for images and added it through a media directory in the settings.py , updated movie/urls.py , made migrations, added bootstrap icons for published date , category and author, made some CSS and tried to fixed layouts on elements.

Added search text box on left side of page, created about_us.html ,relocated about_us.html to the correct path templates/movie/directory,updated views.py to use Django Q for search on title or text, created small test layout for about us page.

Organized CSS file into logical sections: General , Movie List, Icons-Badges-Buttons(Shared), Shared Components , Movie Detail. Enhanced .detail-movie-btn with dynamic "Neon-style" hover effect. Created comment section for Old legacy CSS as backup. Created Director model and added it into the admin.py for full management in Django Admin. Made Migrations, Added foreign key of director to main model Movie. Added basic object-fit: cover; CSS for class card-image-main for every main image on the cards layout so every image looks consistent and keeps each image aspect ratio.
Changed and re-constructed sidebar, movie cards. Change Icons on sidebar and movie_list layouts also and added CSS on them. Refactor and created new classes to be able to use them as CSS selectors.
Added new favicon for the site, to test it!

Added 'release_date' field to Movie model to track release date of each movie. Implemented staggered CSS animations (fade-in, slide-up) for movie cards, welcome header, and footer for a smooth visual effect. Refined Django Admin with new filters and list displays for the release_date field. Executed database migrations to support the updated schema. Fixed UI bugs related to animation and element visibility (opacity issues). Updated filters on movie list following the recent movies logic, all the movies ordered by release date. Switched language to 'en-us' for consistent English date formatting across the site. Enhanced footer design with social icons, neon effects improved responsiveness and animations.

Added duration field to Movie model and Admin, created format_duration custom template filter (minutes to h/min) inside new created directory (inside main directory movie) named templatetags with __init__.py file and movie_extras.py file that contains the filter code, Implemented movie reviews sections with empty state UI and animations plus created new model Reviews made migrations and connected it to Admin with filters and easy to function method with a lot of reviews. Backend and Frontend connection with new POST requests.

Created new field on Movie model , on models.py trailer_url to added trailer of each movie. Made migrations. Created new filter on movie_extras.py to transform a YouTube URL into an embed one. Added YouTube trailer integration in movie_detail with 16:9 aspect ratio. Fixed critical varius responsive issues in movie_detail container. Implemented flex-direction: column-reverse for header to place 'Back' button above title on mobile. Adjusted info-lines with flex-wrap and box-sizing to prevent overflow on small screens. Set trailer width to (calc 100% + offset) for better mobile User Experience. Cleaned up extra not needed Media Queries in CSS and synchronized breakpoints. Fixed container margins/paddings to keep all elements inside the screen width on mobile (Fixed mobile layout overflow). Stabilized sidebar and main-content alignment for 768px and 576px viewports. Fixed issues on base.html with sidebar padding and main content container so there are no gaps.

Added new field on main Movie model (imdb_rating), made migrations. Added the new label on movie_detail.html also to make it appear on site. Added CSS for it and changed layouts with added by label so they are paralell to each other. Made UI alignment fixes. Changed placeholders colors to more bright and on click effect text color also brighter. Touched up a bit the hover effect on info-line to make the background color a bit more bright.

Transformed Sidebar into Mobile Responsive Sidebar (Offcanvas) so it pops through a filter button when pressed into tablets and mobile devices for easier access and space management. Added the small button with filter icon. Edited Django Mode Alerts with CSS matching the site theme and created message for user posting his review with the new CSS edited Django Mode Alerts. Created javascript file and added Auto-hide Alerts after 4 seconds so they go away from users UI smoothly. Added new option (Clearable Filters) so the user can clear his choice on both dropdown select menus easily. Transferred all the javascript code from base.html file to new animations.js file for all JavaScript codes for better organization (Added comments for each JS too). Corrected Model Category appearing on DjangoAdmin panel from Categorys (wrong plural) to Categories through adding class Meta section on models.py file on the Category model.

Made small CSS change on custom-info-line-border new class for mobile-table device view only of movie_detail page. (The <hr> like line that divides the 4 info-line elements into 2 and 2 so they fit in the smaller devices view , made like hr neon-divider class)
Changed CSS about Movie Title Trailer on mobile devices and tablets so its not stuck with the main container borders.
Added Previous button for Pagination on movie_list.html, and fixed the movie_detail.html text under No Reviews Yet making it visible.
